document_data.name: Bright Banner Brandished
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Bright Banner Brandished''' was an adventuring company in [[Neverwinter]].

In [[1261 DR]], the wizard [[Ashemmi]] joined, having left her home in the [[Neverwinter Woods]]. In [[1266 DR]], the company were trapped in subterranean crypts north of [[Mirabar]] by the [[lich]] [[Orvanath]]. The entire company died, except Ashemmi, who used a ''[[teleport]]'' scroll to escape.{{Cite dragon/357/Volo's Guide: Renegades of Darkhold|74}}
